docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs

docs.text: Mkdocs Setup mkdocs new . 會新增兩個file/folder 1. mkdocs.yml --> setup your website, extension. 2. docs --> The place you can storage your markdown files. Logo/Favicon設定 ├─docs │ └─assets │ └─images │ └─my-dragon-solid.svg ├─mkdocs.yml theme : ... logo : assets/images/my-dragon-solid.svg favicon : assets/images/my-dragon-solid.svg 顏色設定 基本 theme : ... palette : primary : blue grey # 主色系 accent : indigo # 超連結顏色 亮色/暗色模式 theme : ... palette : - scheme : default primary : blue grey accent : indigo toggle : icon : material/toggle-switch-off-outline name : Switch to dark mode - scheme : slate primary : black accent : indigo toggle : icon : material/toggle-switch name : Switch to light mode Header 設定 新增repo repo_url : # repository url repo_name : # display name ... theme : Footer 設定 Social icons theme : ... extra : social : - icon : fontawesome/brands/github link : https://github.com/{#id} - icon : fontawesome/solid/paper-plane link : mailto:{#email} - icon : fontawesome/solid/globe link : https://{#id}.github.io/ - icon : fontawesome/brands/linkedin link : https://www.linkedin.com/in/{#id}/ Additional CSS ├─docs │ ├─assets │ │ └─images │ ├─stylesheets │ │ └─mycss.css theme : ... extra_css : - stylesheets/mycss.css # import your custom css files.
docs.title: Mkdocs

docs.text: mkdocs new . 會新增兩個file/folder 1. mkdocs.yml --> setup your website, extension. 2. docs --> The place you can storage your markdown files.
docs.title: Setup

docs.text: ├─docs │ └─assets │ └─images │ └─my-dragon-solid.svg ├─mkdocs.yml theme : ... logo : assets/images/my-dragon-solid.svg favicon : assets/images/my-dragon-solid.svg
docs.title: Logo/Favicon設定

docs.text: 基本 theme : ... palette : primary : blue grey # 主色系 accent : indigo # 超連結顏色 亮色/暗色模式 theme : ... palette : - scheme : default primary : blue grey accent : indigo toggle : icon : material/toggle-switch-off-outline name : Switch to dark mode - scheme : slate primary : black accent : indigo toggle : icon : material/toggle-switch name : Switch to light mode
docs.title: 顏色設定

docs.text: 新增repo repo_url : # repository url repo_name : # display name ... theme :
docs.title: Header 設定

docs.text: Social icons theme : ... extra : social : - icon : fontawesome/brands/github link : https://github.com/{#id} - icon : fontawesome/solid/paper-plane link : mailto:{#email} - icon : fontawesome/solid/globe link : https://{#id}.github.io/ - icon : fontawesome/brands/linkedin link : https://www.linkedin.com/in/{#id}/
docs.title: Footer 設定

docs.text: ├─docs │ ├─assets │ │ └─images │ ├─stylesheets │ │ └─mycss.css theme : ... extra_css : - stylesheets/mycss.css # import your custom css files.
docs.title: Additional CSS
